items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Deep-fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

items.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with diced tomatoes, basil, and garlic.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, balsamic glaze, and olive oil.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Grilled chicken breast served over fettuccine with Alfredo sauce.

items.name: Beef Tenderloin
items.description: Grilled beef tenderloin with garlic mashed potatoes and asparagus.

items.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
items.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served over rice.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, topped with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Classic New York-style cheesecake with a choice of topping.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cheese and cocoa powder.
